entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 13. POP 30%
